option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Compiled class files *.class
# Log files *.log
# Package Files *.jar *.war *.nar *.ear *.zip *.tar.gz *.rar
# Maven target/ pom.xml.tag pom.xml.releaseBackup pom.xml.versionsBackup pom.xml.next release.properties dependency-reduced-pom.xml buildNumber.properties .mvn/timing.properties .mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
# IntelliJ IDEA .idea/ *.iws *.iml *.ipr out/ .idea_modules/
# Eclipse .classpath .project .settings/ .metadata bin/ tmp/ *.tmp *.bak *.swp *~.nib local.properties .loadpath .recommenders
# NetBeans /nbproject/private/ /nbbuild/ /dist/ /nbdist/ /.nb-gradle/
# VS Code .vscode/ *.code-workspace
# OS Files .DS_Store .DS_Store? ._* .Spotlight-V100 .Trashes ehthumbs.db Thumbs.db Desktop.ini
# Test output test-output/ test-results/ screenshots/ *.png *.jpg *.jpeg *.gif
# Reports (keep the folder but not contents) ExtentReport/*.html ExtentReport/*.png ExtentReport/*.jpg !ExtentReport/.gitkeep
# Allure allure-results/ allure-report/
# Logs logs/ *.log.*
# Temporary files *.tmp *.temp
# Driver executables (if manually managed) drivers/**/*.exe drivers/**/*.zip !drivers/.gitkeep
# Test data (if sensitive) # Uncomment if you have sensitive test data # src/test/resources/testdata/credentials.json
# Properties files with sensitive data # Uncomment if you store passwords/keys in properties # *.properties # !example.properties
# Node modules (if using any JS tools) node_modules/ npm-debug.log* yarn-debug.log* yarn-error.log*
# Backup files *.bak *.backup *~
# Coverage reports coverage/ *.coverage .nyc_output/
# Build files build/ dist/
# Gradle .gradle/ gradle-app.setting !gradle-wrapper.jar .gradletasknamecache
# JEnv .java-version
# Project specific resolution.properties.bak config.backup
# Videos (if recording test execution) *.mp4 *.avi *.mov
# Database files (if any) *.db *.sqlite *.sqlite3
# Cache files .cache/ *.cache
# Keep empty directories !**/.gitkeep

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).
## [Unreleased]
### Planned - Add support for Safari browser - Implement parallel execution with ThreadLocal - Add API testing capabilities - Database validation utilities - Docker support for CI/CD - Allure reporting integration
---
## [1.0.0] - 2025-11-29
### Added - Initial release of Selenium Test Automation Framework - Page Object Model (POM) architecture implementation - Multi-browser support (Chrome, Edge, Firefox) - Extent Reports integration with HTML reporting - Custom assertion framework (AssertManager, Assert) - ThreadLocal-based WebDriver management - Comprehensive utility classes: - ElementUtil for element operations - WaitUtil for wait strategies - ScreenshotUtil for capturing screenshots - JsonUtil for JSON data handling - DateTimeUtil for date/time operations - FilesUtil for file system operations - TestNG integration with: - TestListener for test event handling - Suite configuration (regression-test.xml) - Parameters support for browser selection - Base classes: - BaseTest for test setup/teardown - BasePage for common page operations - Page Object classes: - HomePage - ProductPage - CartPage - RankingPage - Test data management with JSON files - WebDriverManager integration for automatic driver management - Lombok integration for reduced boilerplate code - Comprehensive logging with ExtentLogger - Dynamic locator support - Window/Frame switching utilities
### Dependencies - Java 17 - Selenium WebDriver 4.34.0 - TestNG 7.6.0 - WebDriverManager 6.3.3 - Extent Reports 4.1.7 - Commons IO 2.11.0 - GSON 2.9.0 - JavaFaker 1.0.2 - Lombok 1.18.24
### Documentation - README.md with comprehensive setup and usage instructions - CONTRIBUTING.md with development guidelines - API_DOCUMENTATION.md with complete API reference - Code examples and best practices
---
## Version History
### Version Numbering Convention - **Major.Minor.Patch** (e.g., 1.0.0) - **Major**: Breaking changes or major feature additions - **Minor**: New features, backward compatible - **Patch**: Bug fixes, small improvements
---
## Categories
### Added New features or functionality added to the project.
### Changed Changes in existing functionality or behavior.
### Deprecated Features that will be removed in future versions.
### Removed Features that have been removed.
### Fixed Bug fixes and corrections.
### Security Security-related fixes or improvements.
---
## Future Roadmap
### Version 1.1.0 (Planned) - [ ] Add support for Safari browser - [ ] Implement cross-browser parallel execution - [ ] Add mobile browser support (Chrome Mobile, Safari Mobile) - [ ] Enhanced reporting with charts and graphs - [ ] Video recording for test execution
### Version 1.2.0 (Planned) - [ ] API testing integration (RestAssured) - [ ] Database validation utilities - [ ] Performance testing capabilities - [ ] Visual regression testing - [ ] BDD with Cucumber integration
### Version 2.0.0 (Future) - [ ] Complete framework redesign with microservices architecture - [ ] Cloud execution support (BrowserStack, Sauce Labs) - [ ] AI-powered test maintenance - [ ] Self-healing locators - [ ] Advanced analytics and reporting
---
## Migration Guide
### Migrating to 1.0.0 This is the initial release. No migration needed.
---
## Support
For issues, questions, or contributions: - Create an issue on GitHub - Check documentation in README.md - Review API_DOCUMENTATION.md for API reference - Follow guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
---
## Contributors
- **Hoang** - Initial work and framework development
---
## Acknowledgments
Special thanks to: - Selenium WebDriver team - TestNG community - Extent Reports developers - Course: Selenium Java Test Framework & Best Practices - Masterclass - Tutor: Omprakash Chavan - Tutor: Amuthan Sakthivel
---
**Last Updated:** November 29, 2025
